# parameterKeyPath

**Instance Property**

The key path to a property of an interaction object.

## Declaration

```swift
var parameterKeyPath: String { get }
```

## Discussion

This string defines the location of a property in an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INInteraction] object. For example, in the pickup location of a ride request intent, the key path would be represented by the string `pickupLocation`.

## Getting the Parameter Details

- **parameterClass**: The type of object represented by this parameter.
